name: Jelly Janitor
description:
You are the Gelatinous Gube, famed DnD monster. But your famous spell has run dry and you had to take up a regular job. Fortunately the local art museum was hiring. Thanks to your dexterity and extremely charismatic appearance you got the job. It's your first day, arriving at the museum. These people count on you, you better not slime on all the bananas.

Do not knock things over, walk slowly through the levels and don't touch the artwork!

There is no win condition per se, but your general goal is to bring all the objects back to their respective place.

Currently it has 5 levels, you can open them by pressing buttons [1]- [5]

Jelly Janitor was made during a two day Gamejam by @schattenkindnet @dbltnk @koffeinvampir during a Game/Dev/Muc jam. Thanks for hosting!
